item.description:
We're going to House of Blues this Sunday to see Collective Soul. They're touring to promote thier new album which debuts next month. Opening act is Blackstone Cherry.

House of Blues is located right next to Fenway Park. Inside there are bars and restaurants which all serve good food and drinks, so it can be fun to hang out there.

We bought General Admission tickets. Would love to have others join us! We'll provide instructions on where to meet after we know how many we're expecting.

Tickets are still available at: http://www.houseofblu...

Sunday 08/23/2009
Doors: 07:00 PM
Show: 08:00 PM
Prices:
$24.50 - General Admission Standing Room
$24.50 - Reserved Seating 2 - Advance
$27.00 - Reserved Seating 2 - Day of Show
Ages: all

House of Blues Boston
15 Lansdowne St.
Boston, MA 02215
(888) 693-BLUE (2583)
item.name: Collective Soul Concert at House of Blues
